DocUtils

Method Detail

updateDocument

public void updateDocument()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Special content item update function. A query is executed prior to calling this method, this grabs the dReleaseState of the current content item. If the item is being processed (dReleaseState=N), any metadata updates will end up being discarded once the new revision is released. To prevent this problem, a new revision is generated if the item is still being processed, otherwise the core UPDATE_DOCINFO service is called as normal. The query also returns the checkout state of the item. An exception is thrown if the item is currently checked out.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
